plot: Harold, the son of a lumberjack, follows his father everywhere he goes. When the pair truck into Pennsylvania for a day, Harold is confronted with the chance to leave his nomadic lifestyle behind.
title: The Pine Water B & B
plot_es: Harold, the son of a lumberjack, follows his father everywhere he goes. When the pair truck into Pennsylvania for a day, Harold is confronted with the chance to leave his nomadic lifestyle behind.
